title: Matchsafe, "Cigar and Matches", ca. 1900
signed: STERLING, and arrow, pointing right, stamped across letters RS, all of which are stamped on reverse bezel.
provenance: Collection of Carol B. Brener and Stephen W. Brener
creditline: Gift of Stephen W. Brener and Carol B. Brener
description: Rectangular, with rounded corners, featuring raised scroll and bead ornament, beads frame asymmetrical, enameled, central reserve depicting a burning, brown cigar, beneath which are two wooden matches, one of which is burnt. Reverse features same raised ornament, central reserve inscribed AJM. Lid hinged on side. Striker in recessed groove on bottom.

tombstone.epitaph:
Matchsafe, "Cigar and Matches", ca. 1900.
ca. 1900. Silver, enamel. Gift of Stephen W. Brener and Carol B. Brener. 1978-146-378.
